title: Sri Lanka reports 207 more recoveries from Covid-19
content: A total of 207 more patients have recovered from Covid-19 infection within the last 24 hours, the Health Ministry said today.This brings the total number of Covid-19 recoveries in the country to 607,326.As per official figures, approximately 14,693 virus-infected patients are being treated in the country at present.Sri Lanka has now seen 638,043 positive cases in total and 16,024 deaths since the outbreak of the pandemic.
